emailsettings.subject: FIP Certificate Holders Data Request
emailsettings.text:
Dear FIP PolicyHolder,
In an effort to improve our service to your organization and its members, we are requesting the individual member account reference numbers at your institution, for some of your FIP Certificate Holders. This will allow for the accurate update of member data on our systems and improve the processing efficiency of your FIP Premium Remittances and Claims Settlements. We would like to emphasize the importance of also including the member account numbers on your monthly remittance listing and on all applicable FIP member request forms, in particular FIP Member Enrollment Forms. Please update the attached listing with the member account reference numbers and email same to rsawh@company.com or jbartholomew@company.com by May 25th 2018. We take this opportunity to thank you for your cooperation and support, and look forward to continue serving you, our Policyholder and your members.
Regards
emailsettings.html:
Dear FIP PolicyHolder,

In an effort to improve our service to your organization and its members, we are requesting the individual member account reference numbers at your institution, for some of your FIP Certificate Holders.


This will allow for the accurate update of member data on our systems and improve the processing efficiency of your FIP Premium Remittances and Claims Settlements. We would like to emphasize the importance of also including the member account numbers on your monthly remittance listing and on all applicable FIP member request forms, in particular FIP Member Enrollment Forms.


Please update the attached listing with the member account reference numbers and email same to rsawh@company.com or jbartholomew@company.com by May 25th 2018.


We take this opportunity to thank you for your cooperation and support, and look forward to continue serving you, our Policyholder and your members.


Regards
